backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing CRUD operations for client records (with idLuid, nome, senhaCliente, ipVps, userVps, senhaVps, plano fields), global announcement management, and network monitoring status (normal/offline) using in-memory Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: removal of caffeine.ai branding from footer and updating footer copyright to 'LuidCorporation© 2026', both with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files including authentication hooks, React Query hooks, UI components for admin/client portals, login pages, dashboards, and styling configurations with Carbon Black and Neon Green theme.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space, with dark mode as the primary theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title 'LuidCorporation Dashboard Ecosystem' and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with four routes (admin login, admin panel, client login, client dashboard), theme provider forcing dark mode, authentication providers, and protected route wrappers.
Dialog modal component for editing existing client records with form fields for all client properties (except idLuid which is disabled), using React Query mutation for updates and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ClientList.tsx: Table component displaying all registered clients with columns for idLuid, nome, IP VPS, user VPS, and plano, featuring edit and delete action buttons with loading states and modal integration.
frontend/src/components/ClientProtectedR: Route protection wrapper component that checks client authentication status and redirects unauthenticated users to the root login page.
frontend/src/components/ClientRegistrati: Form component for registering new clients with fields for ID, name, password, VPS credentials, and plan. Validates all fields are required and uses mutation hook to create client records.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright text 'LuidCorporation© 2026' with neon-green border styling.
frontend/src/components/GlobalAnnounceme: Banner component that displays a global announcement message with an alert icon and pulsing animation. Only renders when announcement text exists.
Admin form component for setting or clearing global announcements with a textarea input. Includes save and delete buttons with loading states.
frontend/src/components/NetworkMonitorin: Radio group component for toggling network monitoring status between 'normal' (2.5-4.8 Gbps) and 'offline' (0 Gbps) modes.
frontend/src/components/NetworkSpeedChar: Card component displaying a real-time line chart of network speed using Recharts. Shows current speed in Gbps with region and latency information.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to admin login page. Uses admin auth hook to check authentication status.
frontend/src/components/VpsCredentialsCa: Card component displaying VPS credentials including IP, username, password (with show/hide toggle), and plan information in a formatted layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook for managing Internet Computer actor instances with authentication. Creates anonymous or authenticated actors based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: Context provider and hook for admin authentication with hardcoded credentials. Manages login/logout state with localStorage or sessionStorage based on 'remember me' option.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientAuth.tsx: Context provider and hook for client authentication. Stores client record data in sessionStorage and manages login/logout state for client users.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkSpeedSimula: Simulates network speed data (2.5-4.8 Gbps) using sine waves and randomness, updating every 2 seconds and respecting monitoring status (offline = 0 speed).
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on client records, global announcements, and network monitoring status, all interacting with the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom Carbon Black and Neon Green theme variables, defining colors for UI components in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with ID/password form, remember-me checkbox, and authentication handling that redirects to the master panel on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard displaying client registration form, global announcement input, network monitoring toggle, and client list with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Client dashboard showing VPS credentials, network speed chart, and global announcements with logout functionality and client ID display.
frontend/src/pages/ClientLogin.tsx: React component implementing a client login page with ID Luid and password authentication, using ICP actor to verify credentials and navigate to client dashboard on success.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (including carbon-black, neon-green, card-dark), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and theme extensions using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking two completed features: removal of Caffeine AI branding from footer and updating copyright text to 'LuidCorporation© 2026'.
